description: Thin wrapper around the Node.js PDF-lib module. Exposes actions to extract and merge pages from PDFs.
name: PDF-LIB Page Extraction
plugin_instructions:
The plugin provides the following Server Side Actions:

"Merge Pages" combine the the pages from the list of base 64 encoded PDFs. Returns the combined result in a string as a base 64 encoded PDF.

"Extract All Pages" extract all the pages from the base 64 encoded PDF. Returns the extracted pages in a list of strings as a base 64 encoded PDFs.

"Extract Page" extract a specific page from the base 64 encoded PDF. Returns the extracted page in a string as a base 64 encoded PDF.

"Count Pages" count the pages of the base 64 encoded PDF. Returns the number of pages.
